html:
Web Maker

Offline CodePen Management

It's all in the tooling.
With the Web Maker Chrome extension, you can quickly explore/learn/create with HTML, CSS and JavaScript in an "offline" mode (i.e.: no internet required).

ToDo
  • Get images from UnSplash
  • Use Cloudinary for your images (ok, not entirely offline...)
  • Export/Import your creations
  • Use a GitHub repository to store your exported creations.
  • Add libraries through Web Maker
  • Some other good benefit, I don't know what quite yet...
title: Offline CodePens
